00042 void CommonResources::load_gfx(std::string skin)
00043 {
00044   CL_Zip_Archive zip(skin);
00045   CL_ResourceManager gfx("gfx.xml",&zip, false);
00046   CL_ResourceManager gfx_pieces("pieces.xml", &zip, false);
00047 
00048   main_font = new CL_Font("font", &gfx);
00049 
00050   // Then, propreties
00051   pieces_width = CL_Integer_to_int("pieces/width", &gfx_pieces);
00052   pieces_height = CL_Integer_to_int("pieces/height", &gfx_pieces);
00053 
00054   player1.load_gfx(skin);
00055 
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 void CommonResources::unload_gfx()
00060 {
00061   if(main_font)
00062   {
00063     delete main_font;
00064     main_font = NULL;
00065   }
00066 
00067   player1.unload_gfx();
00068 
00069 }

00075   return &instance;
